trans-unit.resname: My name is %(name)s and I am %(age)d years old.
trans-unit.source: My name is %(name)s and I am %(age)d years old.
trans-unit.target: Mein Name ist %(name)s und ich bin %(age)d Jahre alt.

trans-unit.resname: My name is %(name3)s and I am %(age3)d years old.
trans-unit.source: My name is %(name3)s and I am %(age3)d years old.
trans-unit.target: Mein Name ist %(name)3)s und ich bin %(age3)d Jahre alt.

trans-unit.resname: My name is $name and I am $age years old.
trans-unit.source: My name is $name and I am $age years old.
trans-unit.target: Mein Name ist $name und ich bin %(age)d Jahre alt.

trans-unit.resname: My name is %s and I am %d years old.
trans-unit.source: My name is "%s" and I am %d years old.
trans-unit.target: Mein Name ist «%(name)s» und ich bin %(age)d Jahre alt.

trans-unit.resname: My name is {name} and I am {age} years old.
trans-unit.source: My name is {name} and I am {age} years old.
trans-unit.target: Mein Name ist %(name)s und ich bin %(age)d Jahre alt.

trans-unit.resname: My name is "{name}" and I am {age} years old.
trans-unit.source: My name is "{name}" and I am {age} years old.
trans-unit.target: Mein Name ist {name} und ich bin %(age)d Jahre alt.

trans-unit.resname: My name is %1$s and I am %2$d years old.
trans-unit.source: My name is %1$s and I am %2$d years old.
trans-unit.target: Mein Name ist %3$d und ich bin %1$s Jahre alt.

trans-unit.resname: My name is %s and I am %s years old.
trans-unit.source: My name is %s and I am %s years old.
trans-unit.target: Mein Name ist %s und ich bin %s Jahre alt.

trans-unit.source: Source and target are the same.
trans-unit.target: Source and target are the same.

trans-unit.source: Source and target are the same but it should not be reported because there is a do not translate flag.
trans-unit.target: Source and target are the same but it should not be reported because there is a do not translate flag.

trans-unit.source: Source and target only differ by case.
trans-unit.target: Source and Target only Differ by Case.

trans-unit.source: This translation unit has a bad state attribute.
trans-unit.target: Source and target are not the same.
